author: Joy Saha
title: "The View" partisan debate about gun control shows exactly why we still have a shooting problem

sentence: Trump has made various risky endorsements, including David Perdue against incumbent Brian Kemp in Georgia's gubernatorial race.
author: Alia Shoaib
title: 'Gambler' Trump is going against advisers by endorsing risky candidates like Dr. Oz and JD Vance, report says

sentence: As top Republicans including the state's Governor Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger rejected those claims, Trump backed their primary challengers, former Senator David Perdue and GOP Representative Jody Hice.
author: Andrew Stanton
title: Ex-Trump Aide Slams Former Boss for Endorsements 'Based on Grievance'
